column4: Hi everyone, I have a doubt.... My server is behind a router that is behind a cable modem that is possibly behind a lot of stuff from the ISP (I don't have a dedicated IP address...). Is there any way to access this server from outside (anywhere else on the planet) ? Maybe some method ? Other than a VPN ?
I recommend using a non-standard port for ssh. It will cut down on break-in attempts...
I'm doing it. Thanks binaryme :) and projekt2
oh and then you'll take over my server lol
I also recommend allowing ssh logins via public/private key only once you get it going...
